uvi.description:
hwmon: (w83791d) Fix NULL pointer dereference by removing unnecessary structure field

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.151 by commit 44d3c480e4e2a75bf6296a18b4356157991ccd80. For more details please see the references link.
